title: WIHOLL Women's Summer A-Line Sleeveless Boat Neck Mini Dress Club Party Little Short Dresses
description: Size Guide: XS= 2-4, S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18, XXL=US 20-22. Summer A Line Mini Dress For Women Is Made Of High-Quality Fabric, Super Soft, Stretchy And Comfy Against The Skin.

Design: A Classic A Line Mini Dress With A Gentle Boat Neckline. Finished With A Back Zip For Easy Wearing. Just Slip It On And You'Re Off For Some Weekend Fun! Have Your It-Girl Moment In Our Wiholl Mini Dress! It's The Dreamy 90S-Inspired Sleeveless Mini You Need In Your Wardrobe Now.

Features: A Line Dresses For Women/ Mini Dress/ Summer Dress For Women 2025/ Wedding Guest Dresses For Women/ Party Dresses For Women/ Elegant Dresses/ Sleeveless Dress For Women/ Graduation Dress/ Date Night Dresses For Women/ Birthday Dresses/ Going Out Dresses For Women/ Cocktail Dresses For Women/ Formal Dresses For Women

Match: The Simple And Sleek Silhouette With A Classy Boat Neckline Makes It Such A Versatile Piece That You Can Style In A Million Ways Across Seasons. Wear It With Strappy Heels For A Special Event Or Go Bold For Nights Out With Over-The-Knee Leather Boots And A Blazer!

Clothing Care: Machine Or Hand Wash With Cold Water/Hang Or Line Dry/No Bleach/No Dry Clean/Warm Iron If Needed.Please Refer To The Wiholl Size Chart Before Ordering. For Any Other Questions, Please Feel Free To Contact Us Anytime!
